[{"comment": "Some of us may have had similar unhappy moments - at home, at school, among peers and family. We believed the lie that we are not good enough. Some of us may have the best of beginnings, but a failure or a series of failures may have corroded our self-esteem. Still, some of us may have everything going in favor of us, but our constant negative self-talk could be harming.

Whatever be the reason, there is a possibility of repairing your spirit and nurturing your lost self-esteem. Here are some tips to boost your low self esteem:

1. Put a stop to victimhood
The more you think that you‚Äôve been a victim of unfavorable circumstances and people, the weaker you feel. It is time to stop being the victim. See your past as a dream and look forward to the future with the roar of a lion!
. Remove the baggage
The times you were bullied, the times you felt put down, and the instances of failure lend a damaging emotional baggage. Emotions attached to every distasteful memory damage the foundation of one‚Äôs self-esteem. Dropping them becomes essential for nurturing self-confidence. But, how do you drop emotions that have ransacked your mind for so long? Through meditation!

Meditation to boost self-esteem is a reality. The process not only clears your mind of distressing emotions but it also makes you comfortable with your self. When you are comfortable with your self, your self-confidence gets a tremendous boost.

3. Curtail the negative self-talk
Sometimes it is our minds pulling us down with constant doubts and other negative self-talk. Instead of grumbling on your shortcomings, resolve to address them. Instead of indulging in any negative inner dialogue, observe them till they dissolve into oblivion.

4. Compete with yourself
Competing with others sets off unrealistic expectations of ourselves - a tendency which produces a spiral of self-damaging thoughts. It is a tendency which neither makes us productive nor happy.

However, if you compete with yourself, you‚Äôre not only more productive but can build a stronger self-esteem. So, strive to be better than the previous day and previous year rather than the fellow sitting next to you!

[{"comment": "MD. Mahbubul Islam Akash 
Sec - C2 
ID -0242310014121086

First of all, I would Like to thanks our teacher Alomgir Hossain Sir ( Senior lecturer)  for this  course. 

In this course we know about : 
1. Content Coverage :
   - Comprehensive Overview:The class offered an in-depth exploration of carding machines, covering both the theoretical background and practical applications.
   - Detailed Explanations: The instructor provided detailed explanations of different types of carding machines, their components, and their uses in fiber preparation.

2. Instructor‚Äôs Expertise:
   - Highly Knowledgeable: The instructor displayed extensive knowledge about carding machines and was able to answer all questions thoroughly.
   -Communication:Instructions were clear and precise, making complex concepts easy to understand.

3. Practical Demonstrations:
   - Hands-On Experience:The class included practical, hands-on experience with carding machines, which was invaluable for understanding their operation.
   - Step-by-Step Instruction:Demonstrations were broken down into clear, manageable steps, allowing participants to follow along easily.

4. Materials Provided:
   - Quality of Materials: The wool and fibers provided for use with the carding machines were of excellent quality, enhancing the learning experience.
   - Supplementary Resources: Participants received handouts and additional resources (e.g., videos, manuals) to review after the class, which were very helpful.

5. Class Structure and Pace:
   - Well-Organized: The class was well-structured, with a logical progression from basic to more advanced topics.
   - Appropriate Pace: The pace was suitable for all levels, ensuring that beginners could keep up while still engaging those with some experience.

6. Facilities/Online Platform:
   - Comfortable Environment:For in-person classes, the venue was comfortable and well-equipped. For online classes, the platform used was stable and user-friendly.
   - Technical Support:Any technical issues were swiftly addressed, ensuring minimal disruption to the class.

7. Overall Experience:
   - Highly Satisfactory: Overall, the class was highly satisfactory, providing a solid foundation in the use of carding machines.
   - Recommendation: I would highly recommend this class to anyone interested in learning about or improving their skills with carding machines.


Conclusion:
The carding machine class was an excellent educational experience. The instructor‚Äôs expertise, the quality of materials provided, and the hands-on practice opportunities made it a valuable investment. I feel more confident in using carding machines and look forward to applying these skills in my projects.
